org.youscope.common.util

Class TextTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.common.util.TextTools

  • public class TextTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Class providing helper functions to handle text like descriptions, e.g. to convert text to html.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Detail

      • toDurationString

        public static java.lang.String toDurationString(long durationMS)
        Returns for a given duration measured in ms a string describing the duration in terms of days, hours, minutes...
        Parameters:
        durationMS - Duration in ms for which string should be returned.
        Returns:
        String describing duration in terms of human readable units.

      • toHTML

        public static java.lang.String toHTML(java.lang.String text)
        Converts a normal text (e.g. a description) into HTML. Note: To use in a Swing component, enclose returned String in <html> and </html>
        Parameters:
        text - Text to convert into HTML.
        Returns:
        HTML text.

      • toHTML

        public static java.lang.String toHTML(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String text)
        Converts a normal text (e.g. a description) into HTML. Adds a title on top of the text. Note: To use in a Swing component, enclose returned String in <html> and </html>
        Parameters:
        title - The title to add on top of the text.
        text - Text to convert into HTML.
        Returns:
        HTML text.

      • capitalize

        public static java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String string)
                                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Capitalizes the first, and each new word in the string.
        Parameters:
        string - String to capitalize.
        Returns:
        Capitalized string.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if string is null.

      • capitalizeFirst

        public static java.lang.String capitalizeFirst(java.lang.String string)
                                        throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Capitalizes the first character in the string.
        Parameters:
        string - string to modify.
        Returns:
        input string with first character capitalized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if string is null.
